description: One Musicfest adds H.E.R. to Atlanta music festival lineup
title: One Musicfest adds H.E.R. to lineup
title_page: One Musicfest adds H.E.R. to lineup
text:
Burgeoning R&B singer H.E.R. has been added to the already-robust lineup for this year’s One Musicfest.
The singer behind the hit “This Way” with Khalid, from the summer remake of “Superfly,” will join Nas, Cardi B, Miguel, T.I., Jeezy, Big Sean and a parade of other rap and R&B stars at the Sept. 8-9 festival, which moves to Central Park this year.
H.E.R. (which stands for Having Everything Revealed) was recently nominated for a pair of BET Awards.
Tickets are on sale now at www.ticketmaster.com and by calling 1-800-745-3000.
Two-day general admission tickets are $125 (price rises to $140 after Sept. 2); two-day VIP tickets (including a front stage viewing area, private bathroom trailers and an exclusive cash bar) are $250; and Platinum Experience tickets (including a private shaded lounge with seating, open bar and food, reserved parking, merchandise, “platinum” restrooms and an elevated viewing area) are $750.
Follow the AJC Music Scene on Facebook and Twitter.
